name: Ojarumaru: Gekkou Machi Sanpo de Ojaru
summary: Ojarumaru: Gekkou Machi Sanpo de Ojaru is an Action game, published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Oji-san Tomete Iede Gal to no Win Win Sex Life
Ojousama Sousamou
summary: PC-FX adventure game based on the Sotsugyou: Graduation series.

name: Ojou-sama, Chijoku no hate ni Warau.
summary: Hajime had been Nanami’s loyal servant ever since her family took him and his younger sister Hana in after their parents passed away. Every day, he fends off the succession of men from noble families who come to propose to her. One day, Nanami came to their run-down apartment and asked him to teach her the life of the common people. At the same time, a fellow student at Tenshouin Academy, Otoha, asked for his advice in becoming an idol, and Nanami’s cool friend Touka also started acting weird. Then the daughter of the Naname group’s rival corporation, Shiaya, proposed to him all of a sudden. What will happen to him?

name: Ojou-sama to Himitsu no Otome
summary: Ojou-sama to Himitsu no Otome is the first game made by the label MOONSTONE Honey.

name: Ojou-sama no Doki-doki Daisakusen: Norowareta Kurenai no Yakata
summary: Ojou-sama no DokiDoki Daisakusen is a fan-made Touhou Project platform action game, developed by BlueMica. It features Remilia Scarlet as the protagonist and Flandre Scarlet as the second protagonist. Saigyouji Yuyuko is also a playable character.

name: Ojiv
summary:
Tear sexy villain's clothes apart! Undress the anime girls with a rhythmic challenge. Win your fights while vibing to catchy music.

Use your quick reflexes and sense of rhythm to tap, hold, spam and swipe your way through each song, earning high scores and unlocking new characters and songs as you progress.

name: O Jardim Magico 3
summary: The magic class helps to consolidate the knowledge acquired in School in a fun way. Facilitates learning and prepares the child for new challenges. Portuguese Language, Mathematics, Fun holidays, Junior Graphics, and Who knows, knows!, Recess.

name: Ojanko Yakata
summary: Ojanko Yakata is an adult mahjong.

name: Ojou-sama Express
summary: The protagonist boards the special express train "Vega" that departs from Wakkanai in Hokkaido and travels through various cities such as Tokyo and Osaka over a period of 15 days, crossing Japan. During this journey, the objective of the game is to get to know and become friends with the girls who board the train at various stations, leaving behind enjoyable memories. The basic actions involve moving around the Vega's train cars and tourist spots to find the girls and engage in multiple conversations to advance the scenario.

name: Ojarumaru: Mitsunegai Jinja no Ennichi de Ojaru!
summary: Turn the fun of the festival into a mini game. If you get a high score in a mini game, you will get a Menko card. Collected Enco Cards can be used to play against friends or exchange Menco. The modes are "Kin-chan's goldfish scooping", "Mike's relaxing quoits", "Sachiyo Usui's yo-yo fishing", "Tommy grandpa's shooting", "Ken's octopus grilling", "Haunted mansion captain's haunted mansion", "Poverty god and twin dog mini" "Golf", "Cold Sai and Ko-chan's fortune-telling", and "Menko card game" are available. Fortune-telling can be printed out with a pocket printer.

name: Ojarumaru: Tsukiyo ga Ike no Takaramono
summary: A game of the popular NHK educational anime "Ojarumaru". There are 3 modes: "Tabi-dachi niru (single-player mode)", "Tokukun-itashimasu (mini-game mode)", and "Welcome to me (two-player battle mode)". Set in Moonlight Town, the game is played in a sugoroku format, collecting items placed in each square, playing against each other in a mini game, and more when one of them finishes at the pond. The one who collects the points of is the winner.

name: Oji-Mama
summary: "Relying on someone else? That's just not possible." A young man, exhausted from working at a toxic company, decides to recuperate in the countryside. Supporting him is a kind and buff uncle. The uncle becomes a mama figure, healing the young man's body and soul with erotic healing powers!

name: O.J.'s All-American Race to Acquittal
summary: O.J.'s All-American Race to Acquittal is a parody Monopoly-styled shareware game for MS DOS that is based around the O.J. Simpson trial.

name: Ojo Por Ojo
summary:
Ojo Por Ojo was created for Spain Game Devs Jam II and it won the third place in art category thanks to the unique clamation aesthetic.

This is a crazy pass and play race game where you must collect five body parts to win.

name: Ojou-sama no Hanbun wa Renai de Dekiteimasu!
summary: The pretty boy Hajime is an agent of a large secret organization, who was asked by the boss one day to do the impossible. His mission was to infiltrate Houshou Girl’s Academy, where only pure maidens are allowed, and to claim the title of the greatest lady: ‘Highness’. Thus, he traded in his weapon for lipstick to become an agent of matchless beauty. What is the purpose of this strange mission?
